hero.paragraph1: Log with whom you had contact to minimise the COVID-19 spreading.
hero.paragraph2: Enter your password below, since weâ€™ll store your contacts securely encrypted, right on your device.

side.title: Help stop COVID-19 by knowing your contacts.

featureBlock1.title: FAST AND SIMPLE
featureBlock1.paragraph: Covtact makes it easy to track who you had contact with. So you can inform them, if needs be, and stop the spreading through self-isolation.

featureBlock2.title: PRIVATE BY DEFAULT
featureBlock2.paragraph: You log all contacts manually, deciding what's a close contact and what not. The contacts are stored encrypted right on your device. We don't send them anywhere, not even to our own servers. We simply can't see them!
